paper_abstract: We examine perfect information stochastic mean-payoff games - a class of games containing as special sub - classes the usual mean - payoff games and parity games. We show that deterministic memoryless strategies that are optimal for discounted games with state-dependent discount factors close to 1 are optimal for priority mean-payoff games establishing a strong link between these two classes.
paper_title: BLACK WELL OPTIMAL STRATEGIES IN PRIORITY MEAN-PAYOFF GAMES
